00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #include "object.h"
00022 #define LOGGING_MODULE "Object"
00023 
00024 namespace RDK2 {
00025 
00026 void Object::read(Reader*) throw (ReadingException)
00027 {
00028     RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not deserialize object of class: "<< getClassName());
00029     throw ReadingException(string()+"Could not deserialize object of class: " + getClassName());
00030 }
00031 
00032 void Object::write(Writer*) const throw (WritingException)
00033 {
00034     RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not serialize object of class: "<< getClassName());
00035     throw WritingException(string()+"Could not serialize object of class: " + getClassName());
00036 }
00037 
00038 void Object::readObjectBody(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException)
00039 {
00040     unsigned long ul = r->read_i32();
00041     creationTimestamp.setMsFromMidnight(ul);
00042     ul = r->read_i32();
00043     upTimestamp.setMsFromMidnight(ul);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void Object::writeObjectBody(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException)
00047 {
00048     w->write_i32(creationTimestamp.getMsFromMidnight());
00049     w->write_i32(upTimestamp.getMsFromMidnight());
00050 }
00051 
00052 Object* Object::clone() const
00053 {
00054     RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Cannot clone a Object of class "<< getClassName());
00055     return 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 std::string Object::getStringRepresentation() const
00059 {
00060     return std::string("[")+getClassName()+"]";
00061 }
00062 
00063 std::string Object::getStringForVisualization() const
00064 {
00065     return hasStringRepresentation() ? getStringRepresentation() : "(cannot visualize)";
00066 }
00067 
00068 } // namespace RDK2
